name: Deserted Battlefield
description: A site of a great battle that now lies abandoned, with scattered weapons, armor, and the remains of fallen warriors. The military equipment and historical significance attract scavengers and historians, while the violent history can attract restless spirits or create dangerous magical phenomena.
atmosphere: Scattered weapons and armor lie like bones of great battle across field. Air carries old blood, rusted metal, and fallen warriors dust scent. Footsteps echo through place that once roared with war sounds. Skin crawls with sense of restless spirits and dangerous magical phenomena. Taste of violent history and military equipment fills mouth. Weight of fallen warriors and historical significance presses down on you.
